param.name: productname1
param.label: Product name 1st part
param.description: First part of product name in the URL.

param.name: productname2
param.label: Product name 2nd part
param.description: Second part of product name in the URL.

param.name: productname3
param.label: Product name 3rd part
param.description: Third part of product name in the URL.

param.name: numberproducts
param.label: Number duplicate product names
param.description: If set to Yes, URLs to products with the same name will be numbered.

param.name: manufacturer
param.label: Add manufacturer to URL
param.description: If set to Yes, manufacturer name will be added to URL before product name.

param.name: manufacturerid
param.label: Add manufacturer ID to URL
param.description: If set to Yes, manufacturer ID will be prepended to manufacturer name in URL.

param.name: categories
param.label: Add categories to URL
param.description: Controls the way categories are added to URL.

param.name: categoryid
param.label: Add category ID to URL
param.description: If set to Yes, category ID will be prepended to category name in URL.

param.name: productcategories
param.label: Add categories to product URLs
param.description: If set to Yes, categories will be prepended to product name. If set to No, only product name will be used.

param.name: fileid
param.label: Add file ID to URL
param.description: If set to Yes, file ID will be prepended to downloadable file title in URL.

param.name: flypagehandle
param.label: Flypage handling
param.description: Select how you want the flypage to be handled.
param.option: Only not default add to URL

param.name: defaultflypage
param.label: Default flypage
param.description: Select which flypage is default

param.name: ignorecats
param.label: Ignore multiple categories
param.description: If set to Yes, only the first category will be used in URLs - use if you have products in multiple categories, but you chose not to add categories to URL.

param.name: sefcart
param.label: SEF Cart URLs
param.description: Select which URLs to cart you want to SEF - all of them, direct link only (adding products will not be SEFed), or none of them.

param.name: sefcheckout
param.label: SEF Checkout URLs
param.description: Select if you want to SEF the URLs through the checkout process.

param.name: producttype
param.label: Add product type to URL
param.description: If set to Yes, product type will be added to URL when browsing products using their type.

param.name: producttypeid
param.label: Add product type ID to URL
param.description: If set to Yes, product type ID will be prepended to product type in URL.

param.name: producttypeparameter
param.label: Add product type parameter name to URL
param.description: If set to Yes, product type parameter name will be added to URL when browsing products using their type.

param.name: parametercompare
param.label: Add parameter comparison method to URL
param.description: If set to Yes, the product type parameter comparison method will be added to URL when browsing products using their type.

param.name: product_title
param.label: Product page title
param.description: Select how the page title for product page should be created.

param.name: category_title
param.label: Category page title
param.description: Select how the page title for category page should be created.

param.name: title_sep
param.label: Separator
param.description: The separator used in page title.

param.name: meta_desc
param.label: Generate description
param.description: Automatically generates meta description

param.name: desc_len
param.label: Description length
param.description: Meta description maximum length.

param.name: product_desc
param.label: Product description
param.description: Select how the meta description for product page should be created.

param.name: category_desc
param.label: Category description
param.description: Select how the meta description for category page should be created.

param.name: meta_keys
param.label: Generate keywords
param.description: Automatically generates meta keywords (works only when Product and Category descriptions are not set to Default)

param.name: keys_minlen
param.label: Minimum keyword length
param.description: Minimum length a word must have to be listed as a keyword.

param.name: keys_count
param.label: Number of keywords
param.description: Number of meta keywords.
